artifacts.name: Twin Strike Banner

artifacts.name: Chain of Command Scepter
artifacts.description: Once per round, pass your squad's entire action to any friendly squad

artifacts.name: Forced Engagement Chains
artifacts.description: When your squad destroys an enemy, it gets a full move action

artifacts.name: Saboteur's Hourglass
artifacts.description: Once per battle, reduce all enemy squads' movement by 2 at the start of their turn

artifacts.name: Deadlock Shackles
artifacts.description: Once per battle, completely skip one enemy squad's next activation

artifacts.name: Echo Drums
artifacts.description: Once per round, after a squad moves and attacks, it gets a full bonus movement phase
